markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 4" pfs="Standard">[Air Walk](/Spells.aspx?ID=6)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Air" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=5" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 317 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Traditions**
[Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Spell Lists**
[Elemental](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=5)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** touch

**Target** 1 creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 5 minutes
</row>

</column>

---

The target can walk on air as if it were solid ground. It can ascend and descend in this way at a maximum of a 45-degree angle.
name: Air Walk

summary: Walk on air as though it were solid ground.
summary_markdown: Walk on air as though it were solid ground.
text: Air Walk Source Core Rulebook pg. 317 4.0 Traditions Divine, Primal Spell Lists Elemental Cast Two Actions somatic, verbal Range touch Target 1 creature Duration 5 minutes --- The target can walk on air as if it were solid ground. It can ascend and descend in this way at a maximum of a 45-degree angle.
